articles.title: Factory Output Growth Slows To 0.4% In December - NDTV Profit
articles.description: India's industrial production slowed to 0.4 per cent in December 2021, according to official data released on Friday. The Index of Industrial Production had grown by 2.2 per cent in December 2020.
